amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert a complete new text which provided for sustained growth and re-empasized policies across the spectrum of scientific agencies that are in keeping with the goals of the original Competes legislation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 12 printed in Part A of House Report 114-120 to provide for sustained growth and sensible policies across the scientific agencies, in keeping with the goals of the original Competes legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 239 (Roll no. 257).

action.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
